ssGUI::​Extensions
namespace
ssGUI::​Extensions
ssGUI::​Extensions::​Shape

Shape extension allows adding/removing shapes in runtime on the GUI Object without too much effort

Variables & Constructor
protected:
    struct AdditionalShape
    {
        std::vector<glm::vec2> Vertices;
        std::vector<glm::u8vec4> Colors;
        bool BehindGUI;
    };

    ssGUI::GUIObject* Container;
    bool Enabled;

    bool ExtensionPreRender;
    std::vector<AdditionalShape> AdditionalShapes;
    std::unordered_set<int> GUIObjectShapesToRemove;
    int NextID;
Shape::Shape() : Container(nullptr), Enabled(true), ExtensionPreRender(true), AdditionalShapes(), GUIObjectShapesToRemove(), NextID(0)
{}
Functions
AddAdditionalPolygon
virtual int AddAdditionalPolygon(
std::vector<glm::vec2>const & vertices,
std::vector<glm::u8vec4>const & colors,
bool behindGUIObject
)

Adding additional polygon in addition to GUI Object.  The additional shape will be appended in the list of additional shapes stored in this extension.  This returns an ID for uniquely identifying the shape just added within this extension for getting, setting and removing it.

AddAdditionalPolygon
virtual int AddAdditionalPolygon(
std::vector<glm::vec2>const & vertices,
std::vector<glm::u8vec4>const & colors,
bool behindGUIObject,
int index
)

Adding additional polygon in addition to GUI Object.  The additional shape will be added in the list of additional shapes at index stored in this extension.  This returns an ID for uniquely identifying the shape just added within this extension for getting, setting and removing it.

virtual int AddAdditionalRectangle(
glm::vec2 pos,
glm::vec2 size,
glm::u8vec4 color,
bool behindGUIObject
)

Adding additional rectangle in addition to GUI Object.  The additional shape will be appended in the list of additional shapes stored in this extension.  This returns an ID for uniquely identifying the shape just added within this extension for getting, setting and removing it.

Adding additional circle in addition to GUI Object.  The additional shape will be appended in the list of additional shapes stored in this extension.  This returns an ID for uniquely identifying the shape just added within this extension for getting, setting and removing it.

Adding additional circle in addition to GUI Object.  The additional shape will be added in the list of additional shapes at index stored in this extension.  This returns an ID for uniquely identifying the shape just added within this extension for getting, setting and removing it.

SetAdditionalPolygon
virtual void SetAdditionalPolygon(
int id,
std::vector<glm::vec2>const & vertices,
std::vector<glm::u8vec4>const & colors,
bool behindGUIObject
)

This sets the additional shape with target id. The additional shape with target id is not limited to the same type, meaning rectangle or circle additional shape can be set to polygon using this function.

SetAdditionalRectangle
virtual void SetAdditionalRectangle(
int id,
glm::vec2 pos,
glm::vec2 size,
glm::u8vec4 color,
bool behindGUIObject
)

This sets the additional shape with target id. The additional shape with target id is not limited to the same type, meaning polygon or circle additional shape can be set to rectangle using this function.

SetAdditionalCircle
virtual void SetAdditionalCircle(
int id,
glm::vec2 pos,
glm::vec2 size,
glm::u8vec4 color,
bool behindGUIObject
)

This sets the additional shape with target id. The additional shape with target id is not limited to the same type, meaning polygon or rectangle additional shape can be set to circle using this function.

GetAdditionalShapeVerticesWithIndex
virtual std::vector<glm::vec2>* GetAdditionalShapeVerticesWithIndex(
int index
)

This returns a pointer to the target shape vertices vector that is at target index stored in this extension.  This should not be used for a long period of time as the vector can be reallocated somewhere as.  Also remember to redraw the GUI Object if changing any vertices.  Nullptr can be returned if index is invalid.

GetAdditionalShapeVerticesWithID
virtual std::vector<glm::vec2>* GetAdditionalShapeVerticesWithID(
int id
)

This returns a pointer to the target shape vertices vector with target id in this extension.  This should not be used for a long period of time as the vector can be reallocated somewhere as.  Also remember to redraw the GUI Object if changing any vertices.  Nullptr can be returned if the id is invalid.

GetAdditionalShapeColorsWithIndex
virtual std::vector<glm::u8vec4>* GetAdditionalShapeColorsWithIndex(
int index
)

This returns a pointer to the target shape colors vector that is at target index stored in this extension.  This should not be used for a long period of time as the vector can be reallocated somewhere as.  Also remember to redraw the GUI Object if changing any vertices colors.  Nullptr can be returned if index is invalid.

GetAdditionalShapeColorsWithID
virtual std::vector<glm::u8vec4>* GetAdditionalShapeColorsWithID(
int id
)

This returns a pointer to the target shape colors vector with target id in this extension.  This should not be used for a long period of time as the vector can be reallocated somewhere as.  Also remember to redraw the GUI Object if changing any vertices colors.  Nullptr can be returned if the id is invalid.

GetAdditionalShapesCount
virtual int GetAdditionalShapesCount() const

This returns the total number of additional shapes

ClearAllAdditionalShapes
virtual void ClearAllAdditionalShapes()

This removes all the additional shapes

RemoveAdditionalShapeWithIndex
virtual void RemoveAdditionalShapeWithIndex(
int index
)

This removes the additional shape at target index stored in this extension

RemoveAdditionalShapeWithID
virtual void RemoveAdditionalShapeWithID(
int id
)

This removes the additional shape with target id stored in this extension

RemoveGUIObjectShape
virtual void RemoveGUIObjectShape(
int index
)

This removes the shape relative to the GUI Object shape with index

RestoreGUIObjectShape
virtual void RestoreGUIObjectShape(
int index
)

This restores the shape removed by RemoveGUIObjectShape relative to the GUI Object shape with index
